title: Science Teacher Capacity-Building Workshop Utilizing Generative Artificial Intelligence (GAI)

context.prior_knowledge: Core knowledge of science curricula and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Science Curriculum-Integrated GAI-Enabled Educational Design and Experience-Centered Activities

learning_goals: Learners can design customized educational content (experiment simulations, visualizations, etc.) for science subjects using GAI tools
Collaborative tasks enable the development of GAI-based science education materials incorporating peer assessment and feedback
Applying the SAIL framework’s cognition-socioemotion-instructor interaction model allows for establishing ethical and creative GAI utilization strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
